general.messageFooter: Initiated by the Dutch Digital Heritage Network

index.title: Demos
index.subtitle: Here you will find small-scale, experimental applications from the Dutch Digital Heritage Network.

dataStories.title: Data Stories
dataStories.description: Data Stories are a way to search Linked Data with SPARQL and present the results in a user-friendly manner as lists, images or maps.

register.title: Registry
register.description: Dataset descriptions published by heritage institutions are collected after registration with the aim of gaining a better understanding of heritage datasets.
